Lyric:
[by:éąźč§]
[00:08.02]I know it feels like things have dropped to the floor
[00:11.92]Your heart is heavy you can't take anymore
[00:15.83]You did your best and gave all that you could
[00:19.70]And now it feels like you have less than you should
[00:22.50]But I say, hey baby
[00:25.26]Don't turn around and walk away baby
[00:29.15]I ain't lying
[00:30.00]When I say hey baby
[00:33.02]Don't turn around and walk away baby
[00:36.77]We'll be fine (x3)

[00:54.52]So start again and lift things up from the ground
[00:58.44]And brick by brick rebuild the strength that came down
[01:02.22]You're just the same you know, nothing has changed
[01:06.10]Little time and we'll be running again
[01:08.91]So I say, hey baby
[01:11.71]Don't turn around and walk away baby
[01:15.65]I ain't lying
[01:16.61]When I say hey baby
[01:19.49]Don't turn around and walk away baby
[01:23.40]We'll be fine (x3)

[01:41.36]If you give it some time
[01:44.99]A little space and you'll find
[01:49.14]Another spark in your eye
[01:51.66]And we'll be on our way

[01:55.40]Till I say, hey baby
[01:58.26]Don't turn around and walk away baby
